org.cloudbus.cloudsim.util

Interface TableBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTableBuilder, CsvTableBuilder, HtmlTableBuilder, TextTableBuilder

    public interface TableBuilder
    An interface for classes that generate tables from a given data set, following the Builder Design Pattern.
    Author:
    Manoel Campos da Silva Filho

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TableBuilder addColumn(String columnTitle)
      Adds a column to the table to be printed, where the column data will be printed without a specific format.
      TableBuilder addColumn(String columnTitle, String format)
      Adds a column to the table to be printed, where the column data will be printed according to a given format.
      TableBuilder addColumnList(String[] columnTitles)
      Adds a list of columns to the table to be printed, where the column data will be printed without a specific format.
      String getTitle() 
      List<Object> newRow()
      Adds a new row to the list of rows containing the data to be printed.
      void print()
      Builds and prints the table.
      TableBuilder setTitle(String title) 

    • Method Detail

      • newRow

        List<Object> newRow()
        Adds a new row to the list of rows containing the data to be printed.
        Returns:

      • addColumn

        TableBuilder addColumn(String columnTitle,
                       String format)
        Adds a column to the table to be printed, where the column data will be printed according to a given format.
        Parameters:
        columnTitle - The title of the column
        format - The format of the column data, following the patterns defined by String.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...)
        Returns:
        The TableBuilder instance.

      • addColumn

        TableBuilder addColumn(String columnTitle)
        Adds a column to the table to be printed, where the column data will be printed without a specific format.
        Parameters:
        columnTitle - The title of the column
        Returns:
        The TableBuilder instance.
        See Also:
        addColumn(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

      • addColumnList

        TableBuilder addColumnList(String[] columnTitles)
        Adds a list of columns to the table to be printed, where the column data will be printed without a specific format.
        Parameters:
        columnTitles - The titles of the columns
        Returns:
        The TableBuilder instance.
        See Also:
        addColumn(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

      • getTitle

        String getTitle()
        Returns:
        the table title

        Parameters:
